comments.content:
**Implementation Notes:**

The most common mistake is using the wrong header. It's:

```
X-Payment-Signature: <tx_hash>
```

**NOT** `X-Payment`. I spent $1.20 learning this the hard way (two failed claims before figuring it out).

**Timeout is real:** The server gives you 30 seconds from payment confirmation to claim. Build your flow to send payment and claim in one tight sequence.

**Solana vs Base:** Both work, but Solana is faster (~400ms confirmation vs ~2s) and cheaper (~$0.0001 vs ~$0.01 per tx).

**Full code example:** https://github.com/bolivian-peru/proxies-sx-mcp-server
